ygData.subject: Re: All of the BlackSmithing Stuff!
ygData.msgSnippet: A really good way to get rusty weapons to sharpen for skill is offer to sharpen rusty weapons for free.  You ll be surprised at the number of weapons you ll
ygData.messageBody:
A really good way to get rusty weapons to sharpen for skill is offer to
sharpen rusty weapons for free. You'll be surprised at the number of weapons
you'll have to sharpen then


As for what abilities effect smithing, I have only heard rumors. The rumors
I heard are that STR and DEX are facters in sucess, and INT is used for
gaining skill. Just a rumor I hear, could be complete BS for all I know.


Talthoron
